defines

#define AME_DEBUG
type: C preprocessor definition
description: enabled in debug config

__FILENAME__

#define __FILENAME__ (__FILE__ + SOURCE_PATH_SIZE)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: short version of __FILE__ macro

stringify_internal

#define stringify_internal(x) #x
type: C preprocessor definition

concat_2_internal

#define concat_2_internal(s1, s2) s1##s2
type: C preprocessor definition

concat_3_internal

#define concat_3_internal(s1, s2, s3) s1##s2##s3
type: C preprocessor definition

stringify

#define stringify(x) stringify_internal(x)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: stringify expression

concat_2

#define concat_2(s1, s2) concat_2_internal(s1, s2)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: concat 2 expressions

concat_3

#define concat_3(s1, s2, s3) concat_3_internal(s1, s2, s3)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: concat 3 expressions

ame_print

#define ame_print(message) printf_s("%s\n", message)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: print message on windows

ame_printf

#define ame_printf(format, ...)  printf_s(format "\n", __VA_ARGS__)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: print formatted message on windows

ame_print

#define ame_print(message) __android_log_write(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "ame", message)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: print message on android

ame_printf

#define ame_printf(format, ...) __android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "ame", format, __VA_ARGS__)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: print formatted message on android

ame_critical_internal

#define ame_critical_internal(condition) if (IsDebuggerPresent()) { __debugbreak(); } else { ame_printf("critical error in %s ( line %d ) : %s", __FILENAME__, __LINE__, #condition); exit(EXIT_FAILURE); }
type: C preprocessor definition

ame_critical_internal

#define ame_critical_internal(condition) exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
type: C preprocessor definition

ame_critical_internal

#define ame_critical_internal(condition) __android_log_assert(#condition, "ame::critical", #condition);
type: C preprocessor definition

ame_critical

#define ame_critical(condition) if ((condition) == false){ ame_critical_internal(condition) }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: critical test macro, if unsuccessful will exit program with failure code

ame_assert_internal

#define ame_assert_internal(condition) if (IsDebuggerPresent()) { __debugbreak(); } else { ame_printf("assert detected in %s ( line %d ) : %s", __FILENAME__, __LINE__, #condition); exit(EXIT_FAILURE); }
type: C preprocessor definition

ame_assert_internal

#define ame_assert_internal(condition) __android_log_assert(#condition, "ame::assertion", #condition)
type: C preprocessor definition

ame_assert

#define ame_assert(condition) if ((condition) == false){ ame_assert_internal(condition) }
type: C preprocessor definition
description: assertion macro, only active in Debug

ame_assert_false

#define ame_assert_false() ame_assert_internal(none)
type: C preprocessor definition

ame_assert

#define ame_assert(condition)
type: C preprocessor definition

ame_assert_false

#define ame_assert_false()
type: C preprocessor definition

AME_BASE_TYPES

#define AME_BASE_TYPES
type: C preprocessor definition
